response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity that I believe could significantly benefit you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the chance to acquire our flagship product for a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This exceptional offer is tailored to provide you with unparalleled value and is designed to maximize your satisfaction and return on investment.

The product, valued at $1,200,000 by you, comes equipped with cutting-edge features and capabilities that are sure to exceed your expectations. It is not only a valuable asset but also a strategic tool that can propel your business forward or enhance your personal endeavors.

Please consider this offer thoughtfully. I understand that decisions of this magnitude require careful deliberation. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to discuss the specifics and address any concerns you might have.

I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this product into your life or business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
